hudson.tasks.Shell.command: rm -rf *.tar.zst *.zip *.deb *.AppImage {build_*}/prefix git submodule init && git submodule update

platform='win32' builddir="build_$platform"
i686-w64-mingw32-cmake -S . -B $builddir \ -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX="$builddir/prefix/" \ -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release \ -DLauncher_BUILD_PLATFORM=$platform \ -G Ninja
ninja -v -j4 -C $builddir
ninja -C $builddir install cp /usr/i686-w64-mingw32/bin/{Qt5{Core,Gui,Network,Widgets,Xml},lib{gcc_s_dw2-1,stdc++-6,ssp-0,winpthread-1,iconv-2,pcre2-16-0,harfbuzz-0,png16-16,glib-2.0-0,freetype-6,graphite2,intl-8,bz2-1,pcre-1,brotli{dec,common},crypto-1_1,ssl-1_1},zlib1}.dll $builddir/prefix/
cd $builddir/prefix VER=`git describe --tags`
zip ../../$platform-$VER.zip -r *

cmake -S . -B build_lin64-system \ -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release \ -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX="/usr" \ -DLauncher_LAYOUT=lin-system \ -DLauncher_SHARE_DEST_DIR="share/polymc" \ -G Ninja
ninja -j4 -C build_lin64-system
DESTDIR=prefix ninja -C build_lin64-system install cd build_lin64-system/prefix VER=`git describe --tags` tar --zstd -cf ../../lin64-system-$VER.tar.zst .
cd ../../packages/debian cp ../../build_lin64-system builddir -rT
./makedeb.sh
mv polymc.deb ../../polymc-${VER}-amd64.deb
cd ../../
export VERSION=$VER DESTDIR=../AppDir ninja -C build_lin64-system install rm -rf AppDir/usr/lib/jvm mkdir -p AppDir/usr/lib/jvm && \ cp -r /usr/lib/jvm/java-{8,17}-openjdk AppDir/usr/lib/jvm export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=AppDir/usr/lib # This is total spaghetti but I frankly don't care. LD_LIBRARY_PATH="$LD_LIBRARY_PATH":AppDir/usr/lib/jvm/java-17-openjdk/lib/server LD_LIBRARY_PATH="$LD_LIBRARY_PATH":AppDir/usr/lib/jvm/java-17-openjdk/lib LD_LIBRARY_PATH="$LD_LIBRARY_PATH":AppDir/usr/lib/jvm/java-8-openjdk/jre/lib/amd64/server LD_LIBRARY_PATH="$LD_LIBRARY_PATH":AppDir/usr/lib/jvm/java-8-openjdk/jre/lib/amd64 linuxdeploy --appdir AppDir --output appimage -i program_info/org.polymc.PolyMC.svg --plugin qt
sed -i "s/pkgver=.*/pkgver=$VER/" PKGBUILD makepkg -s

VER=`git describe --tags` mkdir -p /srv/polymc/{$VER,latest}/{deb,win32,lin64-system,appimage,arch} cp polymc-${VER}-amd64.deb /srv/polymc/$VER/deb cp lin64-system-$VER.tar.zst /srv/polymc/$VER/lin64-system cp win32-$VER.zip /srv/polymc/$VER/win32 cp PolyMC-$VER-x86_64.AppImage /srv/polymc/$VER/appimage cp polymc-bin-$VER-1-x86_64.pkg.tar.zst /srv/polymc/$VER/arch
cd /srv/polymc/ for pkg in $VER/*/*.{zip,deb,zst,AppImage} do sha256sum $pkg > $pkg.sha256 done
ln -sfT $PWD/$VER/lin64-system/lin64-system-$VER.tar.zst latest/lin64-system/lin64-system.tar.zst ln -sfT $PWD/$VER/lin64-system/lin64-system-$VER.tar.zst.sha256 latest/lin64-system/lin64-system.tar.zst.sha256 ln -sfT $PWD/$VER/win32/win32-$VER.zip latest/win32/win32.zip ln -sfT $PWD/$VER/win32/win32-$VER.zip.sha256 latest/win32/win32.zip.sha256 ln -sfT $PWD/$VER/deb/polymc-$VER-amd64.deb latest/deb/polymc-amd64.deb ln -sfT $PWD/$VER/deb/polymc-$VER-amd64.deb.sha256 latest/deb/polymc-amd64.deb.sha256 ln -sfT $PWD/$VER/appimage/PolyMC-$VER-x86_64.AppImage latest/appimage/PolyMC-latest-x86_64.AppImage ln -sfT $PWD/$VER/appimage/PolyMC-$VER-x86_64.AppImage.sha256 latest/appimage/PolyMC-latest-x86_64.AppImage.sha256 ln -sfT $PWD/$VER/arch/polymc-bin-$VER-1-x86_64.pkg.tar.zst latest/arch/polymc-bin-latest-1-x86_64.pkg.tar.zst ln -sfT $PWD/$VER/arch/polymc-bin-$VER-1-x86_64.pkg.tar.zst.sha256 latest/arch/polymc-bin-latest-1-x86_64.pkg.tar.zst.sha256
